entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mont-Joli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:59 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Mont-Joli
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:35 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 35 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
